subject: Home & DIY
title: PEX Tubing Revolutionized Home Plumbing
description: A micro-lesson that makes PEX Tubing Revolutionized Home Plumbing usable.

hook.text: PEX tubing bends around corners, resists freezing, and installs in half the time of copper. It's replacing metal fast.

buildup.text: Cross-linking bonds polyethylene into a network, giving it heat resistance and shape memory that normal plastic lacks.

discovery.text: PEX runs from a central manifold to each fixture in a 'home run' layout. Each line can be shut off individually.

twist.text: PEX fails outdoorsâ€”UV degrades it fast. And it can't be recycled: cross-linking makes it impossible to melt and reform.

climax.text: PEX now covers over 60% of new US home plumbing installs, surpassing copper in just two decades.

punchline.text: Flexible plastic is replacing copper pipes worldwide.

quiz.question: What is a major limitation of PEX plumbing tubing?
options: UV light degrades it, so it can't be used outdoors
It can only handle cold water, not hot
It requires special tools that only licensed plumbers can use
